Mike Borger - Mayor
===================

![DSC_3076](http://www.cityofpampa.org/DSC_3076.jpg)

Mike was elected Mayor of Pampa in June 2025.

Although a distant relative of the founder of Borger, Texas, Mike never lived there but was born and raised in Amarillo. He and his wife Lynnae moved to Pampa in 2015 when he became the Pastor of Trinity Fellowship Church Pampa.

Mike and Lynnae have three children and eight grandchildren. Their daughter Lacey is a licensed Speech Language Pathologist. Their son Tanner is an Investment Banker and their youngest son Chance is a Mechanical Engineer.

My vision is for Pampa to become a city known for cutting edge industries where many careers are available. I want Pampa to be known for great schools, strong churches, new neighborhoods, and well maintained quality of life assets. Pampa will be a place people are proud to call home.
